nodes.text: The Living Force Elixir was a beverage that could be bought at the Salvage Station's bazaar on Nar Shaddaa. Its composition was allegedly 60% emulsifying solution, 5% Kyber extract, 18% rootleaf oil, 13% clarit vitae, 4% Ossan alcohol, and mint distillation for flavor. However, after buying and tasting some, Loonoo speculated that it was just a scam, probably made of rainwater mixed with metal shavings.
